TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XpsResourceDictionary extends System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource

Docs.summary: Represents a dictionary of elements that are usable across pages of the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class has no public constructor. Get a reference to an XpsResourceDictionary by using the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddResourceDictionary%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
For more information about the `ResourceDictionary` element of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] package, see chapter 7 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
